law.catch_line: Plaintiff a citizen of enemy country.
law.text: If the plaintiff is an alien and a subject or citizen of a country at war with the United States, the time of the continuance of the war shall not be counted as part of the period limited for the commencement of an action.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2534.
